body: Hi Giuseppe, I see your point. You are right. We don't really have a clean way of doing this. Maybe we should add a component to let the user change glazing materials for either a HBSrf or a HBZone. For now you can generate the surface by component decompose the brep, regenrate HBSurfaces and run the analysis. Not a clean methodology at all but it should work until I add the component that I mentioned.
